content.text: Match ends, Ponferradina 2, Almería 2.
Second Half ends, Ponferradina 2, Almería 2.
Attempt blocked. Alan Baró (Ponferradina) right footed shot from the right side of the box is blocked. Assisted by Acorán.

Offside, Almería. Charles tries a through ball, but Leonardo Ulloa is caught offside.

Foul by Máyor (Ponferradina).
Attempt saved. Charles (Almería) right footed shot from outside the box is saved in the centre of the goal.
